verbose_text: Histologically, shWNT6 GBM tumors also presented : i) lower proliferative activity, as observed by decreased Ki-67 and Cyclin D1 immuno-stainings; ii) diminished expression of the stem cell marker SOX2, despite no alteration in the expression of NESTIN; and iii) decreased expression of BCL2 protein, a critical anti-apoptotic molecule.
evidence: expression of the stem cell marker SOX2
